translations: 复苏（resurrect 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: So long as Godzilla can fascinate people, I believe he will be resurrected by new generations of filmmakers in the future.
sentences.translation: 只要哥斯拉能让人们着迷，我相信将来他会在新一代电影制作人手中复兴的。

sentences.sentence: You're resurrected with cybernetics and nanotechnology so that you can go on a suicide mission to discover why colonies of humans are disappearing.
sentences.translation: 你在神经机械学和纳米技术下复活，让你能够执行一个自杀任务，去发现为什么人类殖民地在消失。

sentences.sentence: It's not just that it was resurrected.
